name: TEXTILE INDUSTRIAL TOOLS
description: This is a buy and sell Marketplace.
features: This website has an admin and user role.
Admin can add , update and delete products, make admin, delete users.
This Website has an Email-Password and Google based authentication system.
backendTechnology: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Google Firebase, Heroku, JWT Token.

name: DREAMS ELECTRONICS
description: This is an Inventory management system.
features: This Website has an Email-Password and Google based authentication system.
Using this web app, users can add products in stock.
Users also can update or change stock for delivery/buy.
frontendTechnology: HTML, CSS, React Bootstrap, React.js, React-Toastify.
backendTechnology: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Google Firebase, Heroku.

name: MAGIC PHOTOGRAPHER
description: This is an independent service provider photographer website.
features: Home page has a service section.
Users can choose and buy services.
This Website has an Email-Password and Google based authentication system
frontendTechnology: CSS, Bootstrap, Google Font, React.js, React-Toastify

name: Imaging Book Store
description: Book review platform. Anyone can see customer reviews here.
features: You can find out about the book on this site.
There is a customer review page.
Dashboard page has two demo charts.
